query.statement:
SELECT A.MAKE_MM, A.PSPID, (SELECT B.BSTNK FROM SAPHEE.VBAK AS B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID) AS BSTNK, A.TYPE, --(SELECT B.SAYU FROM SAPHEE.ZSDTW007 AS B WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.PSPID fetch --first 1 rows only) AS CONTENT , (SELECT Y.SAYU FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0402 AS Y WHERE Y.MANDT = A.MANDT AND Y.PSPID = A.PSPID fetch first 1 rows only) AS CONTENT, CAST(A. MR_NETWR * VALUE(E.ACCOUNTS,1) AS DECIMAL(13, 2) ) AS NETWR, CASE WHEN A.PSPID = C.PSPID THEN 'ªÁ¿¸∞Ë»π' ELSE 'πÃ∞Ë»π' END AS PLAN, VALUE((SELECT ST.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS ST WHERE ST.MANDT = A.MANDT AND ST.USERNUMB = A.ERNAM), '') AS ERNAMNM, A.ACTION, (SELECT ST.BEZEI FROM SAPHEE.TVKBT AS ST WHERE ST.MANDT = B.MANDT AND ST.SPRAS = '3' AND ST.VKBUR = B.VKBUR) AS VKBURNM, A.DEPT, A.TEAM , (SELECT X.NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0011 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.TEMNO = A.PERSON_NM) AS PERSON_NM ,substr(#MAKF_DTT#,1,6) as MAKF_DTT
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW0401 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.ZZPJT_ID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0403 AS C ON A.MANDT =C.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C.PSPID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCURRCHG AS E ON E.MANDT = B.MANDT AND E.WAERK = B.WAERK
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MAKE_MM = SUBSTR(#MAKF_DTT#,1,6)
--AND B.VKBUR = #VKBUR# AND A.DEPT = #VKBUR#
--AND B.VKGRP = #VKGRP# AND A.TEAM = #VKGRP#
-- -- AND A.EXAM = #EXAM# --
AND A.GUBUN = #GUBUN#
